quest.name: One Step Forward
journal:
Jude has tasked you with crafting aetherial amplifiers.

※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 150. Delivering items with a rating of 320 or more will earn greater rewards.
You deliver the aetherial amplifiers to Jude. The chocobo in his breast has transformed into a mighty hobgoblin, and, thus emboldened, he would gladly have your company again once the time is right.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Forename, let us jump straight into the next part of the process!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I ask that you would craft another vital part of the starlens.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: You see, the operation of this particular type of telescope requires highly specialized magic.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: While I understand the mechanics behind this magic, the sheer volume required far surpasses that at my disposal.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Please, might you be so kind as to craft aetherial amplifiers for me?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: There are no words to express how thankful I am, Forename. Not only are you assisting me with producing the starlens, but you continue to encourage me every step of the way!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: The Studium Deliveries list for Jude has been updated. To view the new list, speak with Jude.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: With the aetherial amplifiers, I should finally be able to channel enough magic to operate our starlens!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Isn't she beautiful!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Forename, it's absolutely perfect! Thank you.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I've just finished looking over the last delivery. We are so close to having all the parts necessary to begin assembly!

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Jude, today must be your lucky day─the ever-busy Jeromere has decided to grace you with his presence!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Wh-Who are these people!? No doubt they're here to extort coin from me! I must report them to the Studium's guard posthaste!

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Thinking aloud again, are we?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: You need not worry. They are with me. In fact, they are members of the poetry group I mentioned. I brought them here so everyone could get acquainted.

dialogue.name: COOLFEMALE04142
dialogue.text: It's nice to meet you, Jude!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Sh-She's speaking to me!

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Of course she's speaking to you. That is, of course, the reason we are here, is it not?

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04142
dialogue.text: Ah, you must be the craftswomanman assisting Jude. Do also feel free to drop in on one of our poetry meets sometime, should it strike your fancy!

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: So what do you think? A magnificent group of people, are they not? We were just on our way to the Last Stand─would you care to join us?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Steady now. Jeromere is trying to help you. He knows you have no friends, and is attempting to coax you out of your shell. You really should be thankful...truly.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Absolutely not.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Apologies, but I am currently in the middle of producing something known as a starlens. Perhaps another time...

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: What is this nonsense!?

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Come now, Jude. Join us just this one time. Only regret awaits, should you continue down this dark path.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: How can you say that with such certainty?

dialogue.name: COOLMALE04142
dialogue.text: Trust me, he knows exactly what he's talking about!

dialogue.name: JEROMERE
dialogue.text: Please, that's enough. L-Let us just be on our way, shall we?

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: <sigh> Having to meet new people is quite draining... I must say, however, I'm rather proud of myself. Normally, I would have been so nervous, even the thought of speaking would cause me to lose consciousness! I must be growing.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You did well.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're improving.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Get a hold of yourself!!!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: It is you I have to thank, Forename! Your continued support has allowed me to really blossom.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: B-But I am calm...!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: ...Did I just speak up for myself? It seems I have changed even more than I initially thought since meeting herhim.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: I see! It was a test. No doubt Forename was trying to see just how much I have grown!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Now enough about me! We are so close to the finish line. With just a bit more work, the starlens will be complete!

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Before we proceed, however, there is one thing I must confirm.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Please come back to see me when you next find the time.

dialogue.name: JUDE
dialogue.text: Thanks to Forename, the chocobo in my heart has transformed into a mighty goblin!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Jude is overjoyed with your efforts. He now considers you a Good-natured Individual!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A new quest continuing the story of the Faculty of Astronomy is now available. Upon its completion, the Studium Deliveries list for Jude will be updated.
